sentences.sContent: This model uses the method of mathematical standardization of mathematical statistical theory, constructs the comprehensive evaluation method of monomial and multinomial result.
sentences.sContent_eng: This model uses the method of mathematical standardization of mathematical statistical theory, constructs the comprehensive evaluation method of monomial and multinomial result.
sentences.sCn: 该模型利用数理统计理论中数据标准化的方法，构造了单项成绩以及多项成绩的综合评价方法。

sentences.sContent: The algorithm utilizes the common nullspace of a set of fourth-order cumulant matrices of the output signals to identify an unknown MIMO channel impulse response up to a constant monomial matrix.
sentences.sContent_eng: The algorithm utilizes the common nullspace of a set of fourth-order cumulant matrices of the output signals to identify an unknown MIMO channel impulse response up to a constant monomial matrix.
sentences.sCn: 该算法利用一组输出信号的四阶累积量矩阵的零空间，把一个未知多输入多输出（MIMO）信道的冲激响应辨识成一个常的单项矩阵。

trans.tranOther: consisting of a single algebraic term
an expression consisting of a single term, such as 5ax
